title: Cabin in the Cotton
medium: Oil on cotton, mounted on Masonite
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Purchased with funds provided by Thomas F. Pick and Mary P. Hines in memory of their mother Frances W. Pick

thumbnail.alt_text: Painting of a cabin set below a dark blue sky and fluffy white clouds. Behind it is a field of many small white dots. In front, a dark-skinned woman sits and a dark-skinned child plays among roaming chickens and dogs in a fenced-in yard.
